attributes.action: ban the dangerous mesh/ netting around bird feed which can trap bird feet and beaks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The mesh netting around bird feed fat balls and peanuts has been shown to be dangerous. According to the RSPB website: "Peanuts and fat balls are regularly sold in nylon mesh bags. Never put out any food in mesh bags. These may trap birds’ feet and even cause broken or torn off feet and legs. Birds with a barbed tongue, eg woodpeckers, can become trapped by their beaks."
We call upon the Prime Minister to bring in legislation to ban these mesh bags for bird feed.
